section.title: Specific field properties
section.para: Let's explain the specific properties of each field type:

listitem.para: Compatible field type: Long text, E-mail, Rich text

Specific properties
Size: input text length.
MaxLength: Maximum number of characters allowed.
Required: Indicates if it’s mandatory to fill this field.
Show html: indicates whether the contents of the field is interpreted as html in show mode.
Formula. to enter expressions that will be evaluated to set the field value. These expressions are described in TODO: LINK_TO_FORMULAS_section.
Range value. A range formula allows you to let you specify the values that the user can select from an specific field. These expressions are described TODO: LINK_TO_FORMULAS_section
Pattern. Allow introduce an expression to specify the validation of the field. In case that the field value introduced hasn’t match the expression, and error is thrown and the error message has to be shown.
Default Value formula. Expression to set the field default value.
